item.title: Scratchpad
item.description: This is where it is At! Physics ** simulation ** https://www.khanacademy.org/partner-content/pixar/simulation Particle simulation Cool simulation from khan academy spring mass damper Really cool! PID implementation in C++ https://gist.github.com/bradley219/5373998 sample clean website for Hugo https://www.jakewiesler.com/blog/hugo-directory-structure/ this is his website - https://github.com/jakewies/jakewiesler.com Get hugo to build with Gitlab https://github.com/peaceiris/actions-hugo Git replace master branch with another branch git checkout seotweaks git merge -s ours master git checkout master git merge seotweaks Training a Model with LinearRegressor Learning X11 Forwarding on Crouton, can ssh into another box (beast) and run xfce can get xfce or gnome started with sudo enter-chroot -n ssh -X beast xfce This will forward the xfce interface through SSH and to the display on chromebooks Some good reading on reddit for Vim and Python https://www.
